title: This cheesy 90's font (KORG DDM)
tags: all i know is it is from the late 80's early 90's
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820201842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/korg_ddm110_4008.jpg)
  
 [http://www.vintagesynth.com/korg/ddm110.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820201842/http:/www.vintagesynth.com/korg/ddm110.php "http://www.vintagesynth.com/korg/ddm110.php")

I have been trying to get a confirmed name on this font. I am somewhat certain a whole font exists for it because there are many similar logos from the same era, and because this was a digitally designed logo.

HELP.  
Yes, I am aware that it is super cheesy.
author: laserbrains

comments.content:
These similar logos you speak of: are they all for Korg equipment, or for other companies also?

Looking at the link you provided tends to make me think that it is hand-lettering rather than a font.
If it is a font, it's more likely to be custom than off the shelf, anyway.
